column7: The study of Scenic Technology includes assembling a toolkit that creates a broad and diverse skill set. This course provides the opportunity to delve into and explore a wide range of Scenic Technology topics while providing students the foundation needed to seek more advanced learning. 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. May be repeated to a maximum of 4 hours in the same semester and a total of 16 hours in separate semesters, if topics vary. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor. Restricted to theatre majors only.
